Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.Player

Class Pawn

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.Player.Pawn
public class Pawn
extends java.lang.Object
this is the Worker, each player has two pawns to play with

  • Field Summary

    private java.lang.Boolean chosen
    it's true if it is the pawn chosen for the turn
